message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. Let me know if this works for you.
I'll take 80, you can have 20. Is this acceptable to you?

Considering the inflation, I propose dividing the $100 with a 45/55 split in favor of you, Bob. This maintains a fair balance despite the decreasing value of money. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
